issues.description: The addGuestStudents method in the template repository is defined with two parameters (int and boolean), which conflicts with the problem statement and solution repository that specify only one parameter (int). This discrepancy could confuse students about the correct method signature they need to implement, potentially leading them to include an unnecessary parameter or struggle with the provided template code.
issues.suggested_fix: Modify the addGuestStudents method in the template repository to accept only one integer parameter, matching the specification in the problem statement and the implementation in the solution repository, ensuring students start with the correct signature.
